industry_overview.title: Industrial Plant Power Transmission Challenges
industry_overview.content: Power transmission and distribution cables are the 'blood vessels' of industrial plants, which are closely related to the daily operation and production of plants, so stability, safety and efficiency are the primary conditions for selection. How to optimize the production structure and improve production efficiency is a new topic for current practitioners, and upgrading the power transmission and distribution system is a necessary and important step.

scenarios.title: Internal Plant Power Solutions
scenarios.description: The internal power supply system of industrial plants usually presents a scattered structure, connected from the plant distribution cabinet, and then distributed to each power equipment and production line according to demand
advantages: Flexible busbar is compact, small size, good heat dissipation, low temperature rise

The flexible busbar solution utilizes one backbone busbar through the entire plant laid in a way that the corresponding capacity of the T-connector plus adapter box is set up in each power area for shunting
The shunt is flexible, and each branch can increase or decrease the T-connector according to the demand
And its accompanying adapter box, no additional truncation is required

traditional_problems: In conventional cable solutions, each area of electricity consumption needs to put a separate line, so the number of cables, and the laying of dense, poor heat dissipation, occupying a large space

In the dense busbar solution, the construction of the reserved space for the with high interconnection requirements and the presence of multiple connectors and adapters, thus reducing the reliability and stability of the power supply
flexible_advantages: One backbone busbar through the entire plant layout, T-connector plus adapter box for flexible shunting setup
Compact structure, good heat dissipation, low temperature rise

scenarios.title: External Plant Power Solutions
scenarios.description: The external power supply system of industrial plants usually refers to the transmission and distribution system between plants. System power is large, laying environment is mostly located outdoors
advantages: Flexible busbars have high current carrying capacity and are laid long enough to be one-piece long-distance laying and no additional connectors are required
Flexible busbars are compact, dissipate heat well, and are easy to construct, save time, labor costs
The external power consumption of industrial plants is high, and in traditional solutions, cables need to be used in multiple collocations, which is costly and requires capacity reduction
The cable multi-splicing method is large in size and has poor heat dissipation after being laid in a buried trench

traditional_problems: The external power consumption of industrial plants is high, and in traditional solutions, cables need to be used in multiple collocations, which is costly and requires capacity reduction
The cable multi-splicing method is large in size and has poor heat dissipation after being laid in a buried trench
flexible_advantages: Flexible busbars have high current carrying capacity, can be one-piece long-distance laying, no additional connectors required
Compact structure, good heat dissipation, easy construction, cost-saving
